title: Mark Twain's Tom Sawyer : A Musical Adaptation
creator_credit: United Artists Corporation, APJAC Productions, Reader's Digest, Arthur P. Jacobs and Don Taylor
brief_description: This is the first film version of Mark Twain’s classic novel to be set to music. Starring Johnny Whitaker, Celeste Holm, Warren Oates and a young Jodie Foster the film is a joyous escape for all ages.
